Welcome!

This is my website where I document things I have learned. It is both a resume, and my personal notebook.

About Me

Hi, my name is David, I'm an aerospace engineer at Northrop Grumman where I practice model based systems engineering (MBSE). I have both a B.S and M.S in aerospace engineering, from UCLA in 2019 and the University of Michigan in 2021 respectively (with a focus on autonomous vehicles and optimization). My master's thesis was an exploration of image processing and segmentation on ultrasonic scans of composite laminate panels for impact damage analysis.

I'm curious about a lot of things, but at the moment, I'm thinking mostly about space systems engineering, agile, music theory (mostly jazz related), and machine learning.

Also, I draw! Check out my instagram.

Please bear with me as I continue to add features! To-do-list: hyperlinks, more pictures, fix equations.

This website uses the Hyde theme for Jekyll. Check it out!
